overview:
A web enthusiast and self-taught developer, Daniel Lynton started LyntonWeb in 1999 at age 15. Four years later, after developing a personals website that was sold to a national startup, Daniel opened an office in Houston, Texas. He managed a team of designers and developers leading projects including direct marketing software, content management for classrooms, voice-activated telephony software, biometric security software, web apps for real estate, A/P financing software, and web content management.

In 2008 Daniel partnered with HubSpot, an inbound marketing software startup. He expanded LyntonWeb’s services to help customers grow their business with HubSpot’s software and methodology. He led projects building apps on HubSpot’s platform, including CRM integration, custom lead scoring, e-commerce and live chat integration.

Daniel has grown LyntonWeb to 30 employees with headquarters in Houston and remote employees located around the country.

web_presences.title: Inbound Marketing and Technology Company LyntonWeb
